title: Full Stack Web Developer - Daniel Sucno
description: Full Stack Web Developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, MySQL, Vue.js, PHP, and Laravel.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Daniel Sucno!
hero.job_title: Full Stack Web Developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
hero.description: Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, Vue.js, MySQL, PHP, and Laravel.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs_description.description: I was responsible for developing new features, optimizing, and maintaining the existing web app, as well as developing web services in different technologies.

jobs_description.title: Technical Support Analyst
jobs_description.description: I provided technical support, resolving hardware and software incidents, ensuring optimal system performance, and collaborating on internal process improvements.

projects.title: Chat app
projects.description: I developed a chat web app as a personal project, focused on providing a real-time messaging experience.

projects.title: Platzi exchange
projects.description: I developed Platzi Exchange, a cryptocurrency exchange application, as part of the Vue.js course. The project includes real-time price search and visualization, using Vue.js components and dynamic routes.

projects.title: Note app
projects.description: I developed this note application as one of my first personal projects to practice my web development skills. The app allows creating, editing, and deleting notes easily.

contributions.title: Circular influence
contributions.description: I collaborated with the NGO Circular Influence in developing and maintaining their various web apps for different events, as well as tweaking the main website design.

contributions.title: Help center
contributions.description: I contributed to the development of the web server responsible for creating tickets in the GLPI ticket system along with its implementation in the corresponding forms.

contributions.title: Check if burnout
contributions.description: Together with my university team, we created our first video game where we tried to convey the famous burnout that occurs after accumulated stress.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am passionate about programming. While I enjoy developing for the web, I am also very interested in the world of video game development.
about.description: I am a full stack web developer with one year of experience, specializing in technologies like JavaScript ES6+, HTML5, CSS, Vue.js, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, and Node.js. I have a solid understanding of best practices in web development, and I focus on creating dynamic and efficient applications. My experience allows me to build both the frontend and backend of web projects, providing complete and optimized solutions. I am committed to continuous learning and improvement to tackle innovative and high-impact projects.

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
contact.subtitle: I can boost your project or be part of your team
